definitions.definition: The state or condition of being a human being .
examples: He feared the speedy decline of all manhood .

definitions.definition: The state or condition of being a man , as contrasted with being a boy , woman , girl , or nonbinary .
examples: He was a strapping youth poised on the brink of manhood .

definitions.definition: All of the men of a given place , area , or any human subgroup (ethnicity, nation, race, religion, family, work crew or ship's crew, etc.) regarded collectively .
examples: During the Second World War, Russia lost a great percentage of its young manhood , giving rise to a great wave of widowhood in the country.

definitions.definition: The idealized nature of a man: all of the characteristics traditionally and ideally ascribed to manliness regarded collectively .
examples: My goodness, James certainly is a prime example of manhood , isn't he?
Traditionally, men sought to enhance the manhood of their young sons, so that they would become manly men, but in general, men no longer do so.

definitions.definition: The self-concept of a man being with respect to his possession of the various qualities traditionally and ideally ascribed to manliness ; a man's sense or view of himself as being more or less manly .
examples: The failure of William's business seems to have been quite damaging to his manhood .
I feel that when you boss me around, you insult my manhood .

definitions.definition: The male genitalia , especially the penis .
examples: She spied on him in the shower and glimpsed his manhood .

main_definition: The state or condition of being a human being .
secondary_definitions: The state or condition of being a man , as contrasted with being a boy , woman , girl , or nonbinary .
All of the men of a given place , area , or any human subgroup (ethnicity, nation, race, religion, family, work crew or ship's crew, etc.) regarded collectively .
The idealized nature of a man: all of the characteristics traditionally and ideally ascribed to manliness regarded collectively .

The self-concept of a man being with respect to his possession of the various qualities traditionally and ideally ascribed to manliness ; a man's sense or view of himself as being more or less manly .
( euphemistic ) The male genitalia , especially the penis .
